function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low volume reduction rate and generation of toxic volatile organic compounds during high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective physical disinfection using microwave technology","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High temperature incineration can release air pollutants and greenhouse gases","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection with uvc due to inadequate depth of penetration","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risks of ozone disinfection in wastewater treatment, including high operation costs and hazardous byproducts with chemical reactions. ozone over-dose can cause bad smell and secondary pollution.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant preparation may result in high energy consumption","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant has strong corrosiveness","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant poses a risk of higher pollution","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine dioxide as a disinfectant","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chemical exposure and health risks from chlorine dioxide","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper handling of chlorine disinfection equipment","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of chlorine levels in wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of wastewater treatment and general waste disposal measures","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious hospital wastes and wastewater could cause serious risks to public health and the environment.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include droplet, contact, and possibly airborne transmission in specific circumstances and settings.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for provenance tracking and credit incentive may pose security and privacy risks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overburdening the sparql endpoint and graph database, leading to performance issues and slow response times.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High false match rate in schema matching due to similarity measure","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical literature","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of virus data in ncbi database for kg construction may increase the risk of accidental release of sensitive information.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of virus, human proteins, antiviral drugs, and diseases data increases the risk of unintentional release of sensitive information.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extraction of virus taxonomy tree from ncbi and sars-cov-2 phylogeny kg construction may lead to unintentional release of sensitive genetic information.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extraction of knowledge from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the constructed kg.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation or incomplete information in the character kg related to combating the epidemic","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health kgs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of key aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited diversity of topics covered in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Quality and accuracy of information in openkg-covid19 is not continuously ensured","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low coverage of domain knowledge and sparsity of properties in general-purpose kgs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of cord-19 data set contains unstructured data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased relative humidity in the chamber air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in chamber air temperature","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of filter bed moisture levels","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bed water content affecting the removal of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of using dbaf on energy consumption and indoor air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for further simulations in different climate zones","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"}]}
